Group hierarchy: AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
Reduced RDS instance from db.m5.4xlarge, costing $4008 to db.r5.2xlarge, costing $2817
Earlier I had provisioned for 4 m5.2xlarge EC2 instances, costing $1322. Now, I provisioned for 2 m5.xlarge instances for the web servers and  2 m5.large instances for the app server.
Also went for a one year reserved provision, resulting in total costs of $370
Other changes I could have planned would have been:
Changing EC2 instance storgae from Provisioned IOPS to GP
Changed the storage type for S3 and implement lifecycle policies on the stored objects and move them to S3IA or Glacier after a fixed time period.
